personal.name: Alexey
personal.title: Senior Fullstack AI Engineer
personal.tagline: Transforming ideas into intelligent, scalable solutions with 20+ years of full-stack expertise

about.summary: Senior Fullstack AI Engineer with 20+ years of experience building intelligent, scalable applications. Specialized in GenAI integration, conversational AI, and modern web architectures. Proven track record delivering production-ready solutions for Fortune 500 companies and innovative startups.

projects.title: AI Voice Assistant Platform
projects.description: Enterprise voice assistant with real-time NLU and multi-device orchestration
projects.fullDescription: Led development of a sophisticated AI voice assistant platform for automotive and smart home integration. Implemented real-time speech processing, natural language understanding, and multi-turn conversation management. Architected scalable microservices handling 10M+ daily interactions.

projects.title: Fleet Management AI
projects.description: Predictive maintenance and route optimization system for commercial vehicles
projects.fullDescription: Built intelligent fleet management system with predictive maintenance alerts, route optimization using ML models, and real-time telemetry processing. Reduced maintenance costs by 30% through early fault detection.

projects.title: Product Configuration AI
projects.description: Intelligent product recommendation engine for industrial components
projects.fullDescription: Developed AI-powered product configuration system helping engineers select optimal industrial components. Implemented recommendation engine processing 100K+ SKUs, 3D visualization, and automated quote generation.

projects.title: GenAI Content Platform
projects.description: Multi-modal content generation with custom LLM workflows
projects.fullDescription: Architected GenAI platform for automated content creation using GPT-4, DALL-E, and custom fine-tuned models. Implemented RAG system, prompt templates, and workflow orchestration. Scaled to 50K monthly users.

projects.title: BIM Collaboration Suite
projects.description: Real-time collaboration tools for construction planning
projects.fullDescription: Led development of real-time collaboration features for BIM software used by architects and engineers worldwide. Implemented WebSocket-based sync, conflict resolution, and 3D model streaming.

highlights: Led AI voice assistant platform serving 10M+ daily interactions
Architected real-time NLU pipeline with 95% intent accuracy
Reduced response latency from 2s to 300ms through optimization
Built predictive maintenance system reducing costs by 30%
Designed GenAI platform with 50K monthly users
Implemented RAG system with custom embeddings
Built workflow orchestration for multi-modal content
